channel.title: FIRST Robotics Resources
channel.description: Workshops, conferences, training videos, and calls to support the efforts of those involved in the FIRST Robotics Competition, FIRST Tech Challenge, FIRST LEGO League, their staff, and volunteers
channel.docs:
http://blogs.law.harvard.edu/tech/rss
Resources for participants in FIRST (FRC, FTC, FLL) Resources developed throughout the FIRST community and published for use by those involved in the program. Audio and video include conference presentation, workshop sessions, and conference calls.
